properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 1:47AM MST until January 8 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing Rain. Snow from Haugan to Lookout Pass.
Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches from Haugan to Lookout Pass.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains,
Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to
Haugan.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
